summary: The test suite validates core functionality of the Kubernetes compliance framework, covering registration and filtering of checks, extraction of skipped checks from resource definitions, and enforcement of unique scanner identifiers.
business_intent: Ensure that the Kubernetes check registry correctly registers checks and applies inclusion/exclusion rules based on namespaces, identifiers, and severity levels, that utility functions reliably parse skipped checks from manifests, and that the scanner registry maintains unique IDs and accurate counts, thereby guaranteeing dependable compliance scanning.
